documentation.title: New Group Use Declarations
documentation.standard: The ability to group use statements was introduced in PHP 7.0.

code.title: Cross-version compatible: use statements without groups.
PHP >= 7.0: group use statements (without trailing commas).

documentation.standard: As of PHP 7.2, it is allowed to use a trailing comma after the last item in a group use statement.

code.title: Cross-version compatible: use statements without groups.
